des: Orenda Joint Stock Company (formerly known as E-Leisure Software Development Company Limited) was established
Cooperating with Paradigm Shift Group to provide Spa and Golf management systems in Maldives
Cooperating with e-Leisure PTE to provide Restaurant management systems in Philipines
Cooperating with Viettel Business Solutions Corporation to produce and provide medical management solutions and pharmacy management solutions
Launching SMED Immunization centers management solutions Becoming official member of Vietnam Software Association (VSA)

Cooperating with Metfone to provide pharmacy management products in Cambodia Successfully building and implementing the HIV treatment and prevention management system - HMED for Viet Nam Administration for AIDS Contr
Orenda Joint Stock Company (formerly known as E-Leisure Software Development Company Limited) was established
